title: Supreme Court to wrap up Yes Bank AT-1 bond case hearings in January
description: If the Supreme Court upholds the high court ruling, Yes Bank may have to reimburse bondholders with 9% annual interest, a decision that could materially affect the lender’s finances and set a precedent for future bank resolution mechanisms.
content: NEW DELHI: The Supreme Court on Thursday said it will conclude hearings in the third week of January on appeals filed by the Reserve Bank of India (RBI), Yes Bank and others challenging the Bombay hi… [+4396 chars]
